quotes.quote: Wishful thinking is not idealism. It is self-indulgence at best and self-exaltation at worst. In either case, it is usually at the expense of others. In other words, it is the opposite of idealism.
It had been wishful thinking, plain and simple, dangerous for me to indulge in. Hope, happiness and freedom were not in my future.
The act of speaking our intentions aloud shifts them from wishful thinking into action.
A goal without real consequences is wishful thinking. Good follow-through doesn't depend on the right intentions. It depends on the right incentives.
Writing what you wished was the most dangerous form of wishful thinking.
Never act upon wishful thinking. Act without checking the facts, and chances are that you will be swept away along with the mob.
Wishful thinking gives false gods to people who hunger for gods, but those who yearn for a world with no gods are no less likely to fall victim to their own wishful thinking.
Stop the habit of wishful thinking and start the habit of thoughtful wishes.
If something is true, no amount of wishful thinking will change it.
It isn't common sense that is paramount in this world, it's wishful thinking.
Where there is life there is wishful thinking.
There is a great deal of wishful thinking in such cases it is the easiest thing of all to deceive ones self.
People get into the habit of entrusting the things they desire to wishful thinking, and subjecting things they don't desire to exhaustive thinking.
To me, you can be young in your mind, in the way you think, but if your body don't come with that, then it's wishful thinking.
With the first drink comes the truth, with the second drink comes wishful thinking, and with the third drink come the lies
Unplanned process improvement is wishful thinking.
Maybe this is wishful thinking, Probably mindless dreaming but if we loved again, I swear I'd love you right,
Faith is not by wishful thinking, it is what takes root in the heart and shows in one's actions.
If you have a dream of writing, that's wishful thinking. If you have a commitment to writing, that's the way to make your dreams come true.
